title: Paris 2024 Paralympics opening ceremony begins
content: The Paris 2024 Paralympic Games opening ceremony is under way in glorious conditions in the French capital.

title: Israeli military launches major West Bank operation
content: At least nine Palestinians are killed in separate incidents in the north of the territory.

title: Venezuelan opposition leader's lawyer detained

title: UN says Gaza aid operations continuing after staff forced to evacuate

title: New indictment for Trump over 2020 US election
content: The charges are in response to a Supreme Court ruling that presidents enjoy broad immunity for official acts.

title: Self-proclaimed healer found with 24 human skulls in Uganda
